Benefit Rates Payable
Benefits for guerrilla service are payable at the half-dollar rate, which is a rate equivalent to $0.50 for each dollar authorized to be paid under
38 U.S.C. 107(a)
.
Exception
:  Disability compensation, DIC, and burial benefits for Veterans who are U.S. citizens or permanent resident aliens and reside in the U.S., or resided in the U.S. or its territories at the time of death, may be payable at the full-dollar rate.
References
:  For more information on
compensation and DIC benefits payable at the full-dollar rate based on U.S. residency, see
M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, 4.D
, and
burial benefits payable at the full-dollar rate based on U.S. residency, see
M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, 4.D
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 4, Section B - Eligibility for Benefits Based on Philippines Service
